graph.original_query: I want to buy a Mahindra Car, help me understand what are the recent launches, recommend a latest vehichle. I want to know the details on the features for your recommended vehicle. Format the report in the HTML and CSS theme from this website: https://groww.in/

T004.message: HTML and CSS files downloaded and saved successfully to the groww_in_theme directory

nodes.description: Retrieve information on Mahindra's recent car launches, focusing on the latest models and their specifications.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch data on Mahindra's recent car launches, including the latest models, specifications, release dates, and any available reviews or comparisons. Focus on cars launched within the last two years.
nodes.error: 503 UNAVAILABLE. {'error': {'code': 503, 'message': 'The model is overloaded. Please try again later.', 'status': 'UNAVAILABLE'}}

nodes.description: Analyze the retrieved data to recommend the most suitable Mahindra car based on the latest launch and user preferences.
nodes.agent_prompt: Analyze the data from T001 regarding Mahindra's latest car launches. Based on launch date, features, specifications, and market reviews, recommend the most suitable vehicle. Provide a clear justification for the recommendation, highlighting key features and benefits.

nodes.description: Extract detailed features and specifications of the recommended Mahindra vehicle.
nodes.agent_prompt: Retrieve a detailed list of features, specifications, and available options for the Mahindra vehicle recommended in T002.

nodes.description: Download the HTML and CSS from the provided website to replicate its theme.
nodes.agent_prompt: Download all HTML and CSS files from the website https://groww.in/. Save these files locally. These files will be used for theming a report about the recommended Mahindra car.

output.message: HTML and CSS files downloaded and saved successfully to the groww_in_theme directory

nodes.description: Create a consolidated HTML report detailing the recommended Mahindra car's features, using the downloaded HTML and CSS for theming.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML and CSS from T004, design a report in HTML format that presents the information about the recommended Mahindra car from T002. Incorporate the detailed features and specifications extracted in T003. Ensure the report is well-structured, visually appealing, and thematically consistent with the groww.in website.

nodes.description: Summarize the final HTML output generated by FormatterAgent
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a short summary of the HTML report file output of FormatterAgent in T005.
